title: Stinking Cloud
content:
: Bard, Sorcerer, Wizard, The Fiend, Circle of the Land: Underdark & Swamp Stinking Cloud can be cast by using the following Items: ???

Bard, Sorcerer, Wizard, The Fiend, Circle of the Land: Underdark & Swamp

Stinking Cloud Tips & Notes

Inflicts the Nauseous Condition: Poisoned. Can't take Actions. ???

Lvl 3 Spells Animate Dead ♦ Beacon of Hope ♦ Bestow curse ♦ Blinding Smite ♦ Blink ♦ Call Lightning ♦ Celestial Haste ♦ Conjure Barrage ♦ Counterspell ♦ Crusader's Mantle ♦ Daylight ♦ Elementa
